segments.text: Hi , I haven't seen you in a while .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it has been a long time !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long has it been since we last saw each other ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that we last saw each other two years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What have you been doing for the past two years ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been going to graduate school at USC .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should easily be able to find a job with that major .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am counting on being able to get a good job .
segments.speaker: S2
